name: peripheral_nerve_stimulation_covered
description: Indicates whether Peripheral Nerve Stimulation (PNS) may be covered for relief of chronic intractable pain for patients with conditions known to be responsive to this therapy.

name: chronic_pain_minimum_duration_months
description: Minimum duration of documented chronic and severe pain (in months) required for coverage of PNS trials.

name: prior_less_invasive_treatment_failure_required
description: Requirement for documented failure of less invasive treatment modalities and medications prior to coverage of PNS trials.

name: surgical_contraindications_absent
description: Requirement for the absence of surgical contraindications, including infections and medical risks, for coverage of PNS trials.

name: active_substance_abuse_absent
description: Requirement for the absence of active substance abuse issues for coverage of PNS trials.

name: formal_psychological_screening_required
description: Requirement for a formal psychological screening by a mental health professional for coverage of PNS trials.

name: pns_trial_pain_reduction_threshold_percentage
description: Minimum percentage reduction in pain intensity required for a successful peripheral nerve stimulation trial before permanent implantation.

name: pns_trial_analgesic_medication_reduction_threshold_percentage
description: Minimum percentage reduction in analgesic medications required for a successful peripheral nerve stimulation trial.

name: pns_trial_functional_improvement_required
description: Requirement for some element of functional improvement for a successful peripheral nerve stimulation trial.

name: physician_pns_trial_to_implant_ratio_threshold_percentage
description: Threshold percentage for a physician's trial to permanent implant ratio (less than this value may trigger post-payment review).

name: procedure_code_CPT
description: CPT code for Percutaneous implantation of neurostimulator electrodes; peripheral nerve (64555).

name: cpt_64555_max_services_per_year
description: Maximum number of services for CPT code 64555 allowed per 365 days.

name: pns_trial_max_leads
description: Maximum number of leads allowed for peripheral nerve stimulation trials.

name: pns_trial_max_contacts
description: Maximum number of contacts allowed for peripheral nerve stimulation trials.

name: diagnosis_code_ICD10
description: ICD-10-CM code explicitly added to the LCD, for Other dorsalgia (M54.81).

name: pns_covered_indications_string
description: Examples of peripheral stimulation indications with evidence of efficacy that may be covered, including occipital neuralgia, post-surgical neuropathic pain, cervicogenic headaches, treatment resistant migraines, post-traumatic and post-surgical neuropathic pain in the face related to trigeminal nerves, complex regional pain syndromes (type 1 and 2), pain due to peripheral nerve injury, post-surgical scar formation, nerve entrapment, painful mononeuropathy, painful amputation neuromas, and post-surgical and post-traumatic neuropathic pain involving intercostal and ilio-inguinal nerve distributions.

name: pns_non_covered_indications_string
description: Indications for which current peer-reviewed data does not support PNS, including fibromyalgia, phantom limb pain, diffuse polyneuropathy, nociceptive pain in trunk or lower back, or angina pectoris. PNFS is not covered for any condition.
